I

increaseReservation(long, int, int, String, ProductCategory[], PayMedia) - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayTerminal
Convenience method to increase a previously reserved amount.
increaseReservationWithoutCard(long, int, String, int, int, int, String, ProductCategory[], PayMedia) - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayTerminal
Same method as PayTerminal.increaseReservation(), but no need to insert a card in the card reader.
initialStartup(PayConfiguration) - Method in class de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PaySession
The initial startup method is an adminstrative function to initialise the EFT, set its TerminalID, its connection parameters to the network provider and more.
initialStartup(PayConfiguration, String) - Method in class de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PaySharedSession
See the method PaySession.initialStartup(PayConfiguration) for a detailed description.
initialStartup(PayMessageListener) - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayTerminal
This method initializes the payment terminal and grants access to the network provider.
isCardInserted() - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.CardReader
Checks, if a card is currently in the card reader.
isCommitted() - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayTransaction
Flag for the result of a closed transaction.
isConnected() - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.CardReader
Method to check, if a connection exists to a card reader.
isConnected() - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PINPad
Method to check, if a connection exists to a pinpad.
isDisplayMessages() - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.Configuration
Some payment terminals allow sending display messages (the text, which is shown at the PINpad display) to the application.
isDisplayMessages() - Method in class de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayConfiguration
 
isLoggedIn() - Method in class de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.AbstractSession
Questioning the PaySession, if a successfull logon has occured before.
isLoggedIn() - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayTerminal
Method to check, if you are still logged into the payment terminal.
isMerchantJournalEncrypted() - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.Configuration
Writing to the merchant journal can be done with and without file encryption.
isMerchantJournalEncrypted() - Method in class de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayConfiguration
 
isOpen() - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayTransaction
This flag signals a still open transaction, i.e. a transaction, that is not comitted and not rolled back.
isSharedConfig() - Method in class de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayConfiguration
Helper method to test, wheater a given configuration is supporting a LUIS ePayment SharedTerminalServer (=true) or a LUIS ePayment Standalone solution (=false).
isSimulation() - Method in interface de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.Configuration
Signals if the software is running in simulation mode.
isSimulation() - Method in class de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.PayConfiguration
 
isValid() - Method in class de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.card.ChipCard
Tests, if the chip card data have a valid structure and can be parsed.
